item.description:
Our October meeting will feature a film combining two New Yorker profiles, 22 years apart, of a unique human being, Joe Gould, by a great journalist, Joseph Mitchell, whom Newsweek called "the best reporter ever to write for the New Yorker." It stars Stanley Tucci, who also directs the film, as Joe Mitchell, and acclaimed English actor Ian Holm as Joe Gould.

To allow time for discussion after the film, we'll start 30 minutes earlier than usual with a half hour of coffee and conversation at 7:00 PM. The film will follow brief announcements at 7:30 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Monthly Meeting - "Joe Gouldâ€™s Secret"
